message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product for sale. It's a unique opportunity to acquire a valuable asset that will bring significant benefits to your business. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1400000.
Thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate the value it brings. I am willing to pay $1350000 for the product.

I appreciate your interest in the product and I'm willing to consider your offer. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1420000. This is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to your business.
I understand your perspective, but based on my assessment, I am willing to pay $1375000 for the product.

I'm glad we're still in negotiations. I can see you're serious about the product, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1400000. This is the lowest I can go, considering the value the product holds for me.
I respect your position, but I believe $1385000 would be a fair price for the product given its value to me.
